thread.title: Integrated Ventures Acquires CreditCalc Loan Calculation Platform To Fast Track The Development of LoanFunder

author: cnbc.com
title: Integrated Ventures Acquires CreditCalc Loan Calculation Platform To Fast Track The Development of LoanFunder
text:
PHILADELPHIA, Feb. 7, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Integrated Ventures Inc. (OTCQB: INTV)("Company") is pleased to announce that it has acquired CreditCalc from ITBS, LLC, a high-end loan management and calculation platform. This stock based transaction is expected to fast track the development lifecycle of Company's blockchain based lending platform - LoanFunder.
CreditCalc, created in 2010 by ITBS team, currently powers www.banker.ua and handles an estimated 2,000 users on monthly basis while averaging 200,000 daily visits and generating over 600,000 page views.
The loan calculation platform is a scalable solution and can be configured to factor in all the features of a given market conditions, capable of offering users a detailed summary of all applicable fees, repayment options and schedules.
CreditCalc allows lenders and borrowers to perform complex calculations related to all types of loans including business loans, car loans, mortgages and other financial instruments. In addition, it offers users an access to the custom credit programs and ability to shop and compare for different types of loan products.
"Our team has performed the standard due diligence and beta testing of the CreditCalc and came to the conclusion that by acquiring this platform, the Company will be able to fast forward the launch of the LoanFunder," said Steve Rubakh, CEO of Integrated Ventures. "This acquisition is expected to significantly accelerate the development of our blockchain based loan platform and to obtain an extensive and valuable database of lenders and borrowers."
About Integrated Ventures Inc: Integrated Ventures is focused on launching and operating companies in the digital currency sector:
BitcoLab – crypto currency investing and mining Nemesis – manufacturing & sales of GPU mining rigs and equipment LoanFunder - blockchain based loan management platform MMC – mobile mining centers
For more details, please visit www.integratedventuresinc.com .
About LoanFunder: The world's first financial platform, designed to integrate with a decentralized and encrypted lending ledger, which offers a secure, efficient, verifiable and permanent way of storing loan related information.
About www.banker.ua : Ukraine's leading financial portal focused on providing of banking related information and custom loan management services. Features comprehensive information about major Ukrainian Banks, their corporate structures, connects users with the best funding deals, offers banking services and discusses the latest financial news around the world.
***About Cryptocurrency Investments & Risks***
Integrated Ventures urges all current and potential investors to visit: (1) SEC website: https://www.sec.gov/news/public-statement/statement-clayton-2017-12-11 , (2) NASAA website: http://www.nasaa.org/44073/nasaa-reminds-investors-approach-cryptocurrencies-initial-coin-offerings-cryptocurrency-related-investment-products-caution/ and (3) FINRA website: https://www.finra.org/investors/highlights/dont-fall-cryptocurrency-related-stock-scams to understand the risks involved in cryptocurrency investing.
